features: Radox Antibacterial Liquid Handwash Protect + Replenish 250ml x 2
Antibacterial Handwash specially formulated to help remove germs
Leaves your hands feeling soft fresh and clean.
Antibacterial Handwash With Thyme & Tea tree
description: Product Description Radox Antibacterial Liquid Handwash Protect + Replenish With Thyme & Tea Tree 250ml x 2 Ingredients Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Benzalkonium Chloride, Parfum, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Benzoate, CI 19140, CI 42090. Directions To use Radox Antibacterial Plus Replenish Hand Wash: 1. Dispense a small amount of hand wash onto wet hands. 2. Rub hands together to create a rich lather. 3. Ensure thorough coverage of all areas of your hands, including between fingers and around nails. 4. Continue to rub hands together for at least 20 seconds. 5. Rinse hands thoroughly with clean water. 6. Pat hands dry with a clean towel. For best results, use regularly throughout the day, especially after coming into contact with germs or bacteria. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Safety Warning For your safety, please adhere to the following precautions: 1. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. 2. Keep out of reach of children. In case of accidental ingestion, seek medical assistance immediately. 3. If irritation or rash occurs, discontinue use and consult a healthcare professional. 4. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. 5. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. 6. This product is intended for hand hygiene purposes only. Do not use for any other purpose. 7. Use only as directed. By following these safety guidelines, you can enjoy the benefits of Radox Antibacterial Plus Replenish Hand Wash with confidence. See more

product_details_tab_data.Active Ingredients: The active ingredients in Radox Antibacterial Plus Replenish Hand Wash include: 1. Benzalkonium Chloride: An effective antibacterial agent that kills germs and bacteria on the skin's surface. 2. Glycerin: A moisturizing agent that helps to replenish and retain moisture in the skin, keeping it hydrated and soft. 3. Fragrance: Provides a refreshing scent that invigorates the senses with each use. These ingredients work together to cleanse, moisturize, and protect your hands, leaving them feeling clean, refreshed, and nourished.
